title: [Large-Scale] AI-Based Customized Language Education Design for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate-level language proficiency
context.additional_context: Emphasizing Workplace-Integrated Learning Through Smartphone-Based AI Tools for Professionals

learning_goals: Design AI-powered personalized learning pathways and self-directedly achieve language learning goals at least three times weekly
Complete two language projects reflecting real-world job scenarios using AI-based collaboration tools with peers
Critically evaluate at least five learning contents by applying ethical judgment criteria during AI interactions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
